__e: It is all over now, my heart's own perfection, but for one thing.
I've never seen anything more perfect in my life... than to see the perfection of God himself.
Seeing the other person's perfectness, or something.
I'm sure everything will go smoothly and be a beautiful wedding.
That the way to find perfection and love is within us.
You could have done everything perfect, and David would still have ended up in the back of that car with that girl.
